summary: This bill, the Watershed Protection and Forest Recovery Act of 2025, amends the Agricultural Credit Act of 1978 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out emergency watershed protection measures on National Forest System land. It defines emergency watershed protection measures and outlines the process for agreements with sponsors (state/local governments, Tribes, and water districts) to address runoff, erosion, and flood mitigation after natural disasters. The bill specifies project timelines, payment procedures, waives matching requirements, addresses liability, and mandates coordination with other relevant programs.
